sn22.107:4.2: “Mendicants, there are these five grasping aggregates.
sn22.107:4.5: the grasping aggregates of form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness.
sn22.107:4.7: There are ascetics and brahmins who don’t truly understand these five aggregates’ gratification, drawback, and escape … Those venerables don’t realize the goal of life as an ascetic or brahmin …
sn22.107:4.8: There are ascetics and brahmins who do truly understand … Those venerables realize the goal of life as an ascetic or brahmin, and live having achieved it with their own insight.”
